languages.text: {n}Маражай дергает головой — словно услышал непонятный и подозрительный звук. Другой реакции на ваши слова вы так и не дожидаетесь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Маражай дергает головой — словно услышал непонятный и подозрительный звук. Другой реакции на ваши слова вы так и не дожидаетесь.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai's head turns sharply as if he just heard a strange and suspicious noise. That is all the reaction you get.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai tourne la tête comme s'il venait d'entendre un bruit suspect. Cette réaction est la seule réponse que vous obtiendrez.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's head turns sharply as if he just heard a strange and suspicious noise. That is all the reaction you get.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai tourne la tête comme s'il venait d'entendre un bruit suspect. Cette réaction est la seule réponse que vous obtiendrez.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}奇妙かつ不審な物音を耳にしたかのように、マラズハイの首が鋭く回転する。反応はそれだけだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's head turns sharply as if he just heard a strange and suspicious noise. That is all the reaction you get.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}奇妙かつ不審な物音を耳にしたかのように、マラズハイの首が鋭く回転する。反応はそれだけだった。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋猛地转过了头，仿佛听到了某种古怪而可疑的声音。除此之外，他就没有其他反应了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's head turns sharply as if he just heard a strange and suspicious noise. That is all the reaction you get.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋猛地转过了头，仿佛听到了某种古怪而可疑的声音。除此之外，他就没有其他反应了。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai wirbelt mit dem Kopf herum, als hätte er gerade ein merkwürdiges, verdächtiges Geräusch gehört. Das ist die einzige Reaktion, die du bekommst.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's head turns sharply as if he just heard a strange and suspicious noise. That is all the reaction you get.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai wirbelt mit dem Kopf herum, als hätte er gerade ein merkwürdiges, verdächtiges Geräusch gehört. Das ist die einzige Reaktion, die du bekommst.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai gira la cabeza de repente, como si acabase de oír un ruido extraño y sospechoso. Esa es toda la reacción que obtienes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's head turns sharply as if he just heard a strange and suspicious noise. That is all the reaction you get.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın başı, tuhaf ve şüpheli bir ses duymuş gibi aniden dönüyor. Başka bir tepki vermiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's head turns sharply as if he just heard a strange and suspicious noise. That is all the reaction you get.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın başı tuhaf ve şüpheli bir ses duymuş gibi aniden dönüyor. Tek alabildiğin reaksiyon da bu.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC
